data.text: I would like to appreciate the complex sales manager Mr. Ehab Naem , he was very helpful & helps me with the booking to attend conference with my sister & he was very patience & answered my questions through whatâ€™s up & he was very kind, I would like to appreciate the help of Mr. Pawn for me & my sister laugage    , he was kind with warm smile , would like to thanks the 2 ladies in reception , they were welcome us with a smile but when we asked for lake view for our room one lady told me it charge more money
data.title: The team helpful but the room , towels very old , breakfast average

data.text:
We had an excellent  experience from the time we check in, trough out the entire stay, special Thanks on your two outstanding front desk staff..  Dawan and Lonel or Louel, the Filipino lady.  Their commitment and enthusiasm in welcoming us exceed our expectations... They explained and guided us throughout the hotel amenities, room service, and everything we might need  or want, there's nothing we can asked for. 
The hotel room is specious and if you are traveling or just want to have time with your family this place is a great deal. 
 For sure we will keep on coming back. A amazing experience for our family.
data.title: Place to relax and enjoy with your family

data.text:
I was staying in La Quinta hotel in Jumaira. And I was checking other hotel options and I came across this hotel through booking.com. I was amazed by the pictures and the water front view. The name says it all. Right? And the price wasnâ€™t bad. So I booked one night. I arrived super late around 3 am in the morning. As I was picking up the key I told the receptionist make sure you give a water front view. He said I am sorry you booked a standard room. I cannot give you a waterfront view. 

I would understand if the description says no water front view. I drove 45 minuted just to go to a more expensive room with a parking lot view. This ridiculous.

Customer service is super bad description of the room on booking is super misleading. 
The place is way too far. The AC in the room was not working properly. And I also forgot to mention it took me 20 minutes to locate the hotel because the location  link on booking took me else where. And I had to get a location message via WhatsApp from the hotel receptionist to get to the hotel. If you are traveling business I WOULD NOT USE THIS HOTEL. 
At all.
data.title: Misleading AD and Far.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for taking time to review our hotel following your visit to Copthorne Lakeview Hotel. 

Please accept our sincere apologies for not meeting your expectations during your recent stay. Please be assured that we are taking the mentioned points seriously to improve our guest service experience to meet the guest expectation.

Kindly be informed that the hotel includes multiply room categories and Suites, (Each room category has a certain price) as mentioned in the website and as advised at the hotel reception.

Your feedback about the room AC is well received and shared with the respective department for further improvement. 

However, if you could take a few moments of your time to discuss your areas of concern further, I would be very grateful so that we can continue improving our hotel operations and try to benefit from them to be better and meet your future needs and expectations.

Best Regards,
Diaa El Tobgy
Front Office Manager
0501161863
owner_response.author: Front Office Manager
